revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=VIZIO |model=VBR210 |revision= |manuf=Desay <!-- Desay A&V Science and Technology --> |manuf_model=DS-B029D |availability=OEM |fcc_date=07/26/2009 |fcc_id=XJGDS0001, XJGDS0004 |ic_id= |type=Blu-ray player |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=AC, corded |cpu1_brand= |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand=Hynix |fla1_model= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial= |jtag= |wi1_module=Arcadyan WN7522C 1 |wi1_module_if=USB (non-standard connector) |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43231 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=Blu-ray drive, HDMI, A/V out, Component out |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|VIZIO VBR210 Blu-ray Disc Player}} :[https://www.vizio.com/home-theater-1/vbr210.html Product page] {{•}} [http://store.vizio.com/vbr210-free-shipping.html On ''VIZIO'' store] {{•}} [https://www.blu-ray.com/news/?id=4784 VBR210, VBR220, VBR231 (News)] {{•}} [https://www.blu-ray.com/Vizio-VBR210/14373/ Spec.]
The SoC is covered by a heatsink and is unidentifiable in the FCC photos.
*The first mention of this device is in a CII PC made 07/27/2009 to FCC ID XJGDS0001. :The reason given is the assignment of a new model name (''VBR210''), new appearance, :and new power supply (''it's easy and better to comply with FCC PART 15B rules.'').<small> :''Except the model name change, the EUT are electronically/electrically identical to the original :equipment and that the original test results continue to be representative of and applicable to it.'' </small> *An additional FCC ID, XJGDS0004, also covers this item, and it redirects to XJGDS0001. :The label has a different ''Desay'' model - DS-B029D (DS-B029D-R). {{See also|Desay A&V Science and Technology DS-B052}} *"P/N: 141752220"... is silkscreened on the wireless module. :The wireless module is an [[Arcadyan WN7522C 1]] (OEM: [[Arcadyan]]) {{See also|Insignia NS-WBRDVD Wireless Module|VIZIO}} :The wireless module is covered in a plastic shell (which looks much like the shell :used on the [[Toshiba WLM-10UB1]] ([[Arcadyan]])) which is then exposed out of a hole :in the back of the device.
